channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: The problem assignments are are based on the course textbook and course notes: Apostol, Tom M. Calculus, Volume 1: One-Variable Calculus, with An Introduction to Linear Algebra. Waltham, Mass: Blaisdell, 1967. ISBN: 9780471000051. Course notes by James Raymond Munkres, Professor of Mathematics, Emeritus. PROBLEM SET SOLUTIONS Problem set 1 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 2 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 3 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 4 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 5 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 6 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 7 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 8 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 9 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 10 (PDF) (PDF) Problem set 11 - part I (PDF), part II (PDF) Parts I and II (PDF)

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset1.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problem about unit 1: real numbers.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset10.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problems about Taylor’s formula and limits.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset10sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 3 solutions about evaluate the limits limx→∞, derivative yields and plugging in x = 1.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset11a.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 4 problems about prove a sequence converges, necessary condition and compactly supported functions on R.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset11b.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problem about partII of problems set 11.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset11sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 8 solutions about sequence converges, Cauchy sequence of real numbers converges, A function f and the series diverge.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset1sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 6 solutions about real number y, theorem I.18, positive integers and real numbers and let n ∈ P be a positive integer.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset2.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problem about Unit 2: the integral.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset2sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 6 solutions about polynomial of degree n, number of elements of S, positive integer and defining integrals.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset3.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problem about unit 3: limits and continuity -week 1.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset3sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 3 solutions about values of c, g(x)= x over the interval and step functions s(x) and t(x).

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset4.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problems about limits and continuity.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset4sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 6 solutions about limit formulas, graph, theorem 3.5 and define a function f(x).

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset5.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problem about derivatives.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset5sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 6 solutions about inverse function g?, the extreme value theorem and distance between (w, 0).

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset6.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 6 problems about derivatives.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset6sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 6 solutions about a right-circular cone with its vertex down, Rolle’s theorem, f is monotonic and the definition of the derivative.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset7.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problems derivatives.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset7sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 3 solutions about function g continuous, deduce the inequalities and Find the derivative of x.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset8.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problem about integration techniques.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset8sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 6 solutions about Applying integration by parts (theorem 5.5), general exponentials, deduce the formula and course notes.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset9.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problem about integration techniques/taylor’s formula.

item.title: MIT18_014F10_pset9sols.pdf
item.description: This resource contains problem about Integration techniques/Taylor’s formula.
